required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of the Safety of Intraperitoneal Laparoscopic Radical Prostatectomy With or Without Drainage Tube
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of the Safety of Intraperitoneal Laparoscopic Radical Prostatectomy With or Without Drainage Tube: a Singlecentre, Randomised Controlled, and Non-inferiority Study

brief_summary.textblock: This is a randomized controlled and non-inferiority trial in comparison of intraperitoneal laparoscopic radical prostatectomy without drainage tube between intraperitoneal laparoscopic radical prostatectomy with drainage tube in the safety in men with a loacalized prostate cancer.

detailed_description.textblock: This trial is a prospective, single-centre, randomized controlled, and non-inferiority study in which all men with localized prostate cancer. This study aims to determine whether intraperitoneal laparoscopic radical prostatectomy without drainage tube is non-inferior to intraperitoneal laparoscopic radical prostatectomy with drainage tube in the safety in men with a loacalized prostate cancer.

primary_outcome.description: Any adverse event according to the Clavien-Dindo classification will be recorded

secondary_outcome.description: The difference between postoperative hemoglobin and preoperative hemoglobin
The first time to go to the ground after the operation
The first time to eat after the operation, the first time to exit gas after the operation,the first time to cacation after the operation
The ultrasound and CT to detect if there is abdominal effusion and cyst

arm_group.description: No place the drainage tube after the intraperitoneal laparoscopic radical prostatectomy
Place the drainage tube after the intraperitoneal laparoscopic radical prostatectomy

intervention.intervention_name: Intraperitoneal Laparoscopic Radical Prostatectomy Without Drainage Tube
intervention.description: No place the drainage tube after the intraperitoneal Laparoscopic Radical Prostatectomy

intervention.intervention_name: Intraperitoneal Laparoscopic Radical Prostatectomy With Drainage Tube
intervention.description: Place the drainage tube after the intraperitoneal Laparoscopic Radical Prostatectomy

overall_official.affiliation: Shanghai East Hospital,Tongji University School of Medicine

facility.name: Shanghai East Hospital, Tongji University School of Medicine
